name: The First Island
description:
An experiment in expression and shared experiences. Take pictures and transmit them when you're ready. Then see what pictures other island visitors chose to transmit.

Game by GP Lackey, Marcelo Perez, Nick Rudzicz, Tanya X. Short
Add'l art: Yughues & Poly by Google
Music: "Final Bow" by dissonence
Audio: Cheeseheadburger, Crosbychris, Omar Dabbous, Roachpowder
